attributes.action: Back up Iran on the war with George Bush.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should george bush have any say about Iran's nuclear power, America has nuclear power, we have nuclear power, so who is he to try and control other countries, which from what i can see have done nothing wrong. I didnt believe in the war in Iraq and when the war In Iran starts i know which side i would rather back.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
